Class ServerMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • sharedResources.ServerMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientMessage

    public class ServerMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Encapsulates the message sent from the server to the client
    Author:
    Ian Swift
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
